group_filters.title: Alert Sources

group_filters.extra_filter0: i_state does not contains 'cancelled'  AND network_type in ['FirstNet','Consumer','Enterprise']

widgets.title: Open Incidents
widgets.extra_filter: i_state not in ['Resolved','Closed','Cancelled'] and project_id in {{PROJ_ID}}

widgets.title: Total Incidents
widgets.extra_filter: i_state does not contains 'cancelled'and project_id in {{PROJ_ID}}

widgets.title: Incident by State
widgets.extra_filter: i_state does not contains 'cancelled'and project_id in {{PROJ_ID}}

widgets.title: Open Incidents by Source and Priority
widgets.description: Values: Critical, High, Moderate, Low, Planning
widgets.extra_filter: i_state not in ['Resolved','Closed','Cancelled'] andand project_id in {{PROJ_ID}}
